text:
Hey Michael,
I wanted to follow up to see if you still require assistance with the matter we can discuss on it. and I would be delighted to assist you and provide any support you need.
it should also work with "selecting everything"(cmd/ctrl + a) and then shift+tab.

Hey! Does anyone know how to set up a redirect within the same URL to take the user to a specific section further down on the same URL? Not sure if you just need to add a specific custom code to the working URL, but if anyone has any insight please let me know. Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:

Create link:
```<a href="#target-section">Go to section</a>```
Add an `id` attribute to that section
```<div id="target-section">
   <!-- Your content here -->
</div>```
If you have to add smooth scroll than you can give it try with Javascript or jQuery.
